name: Société Régionale d'Investissement de Wallonie
membership: Membre de diverses organisations professionnelles en lien avec notre métier de société publique d'investissement  (exemple OECCBB: ordre des experts comptables brevetés, IEC Institut des Experts Comptables et Fiscaux de Belgique, IJE Institut des Juristes d'Entreprises, Guberna Institut Belge des Administrateurs)
goal:
SRIW is a public investment company of Wallonia. It supports business growth, from start-ups to large companies, with tailored financing solutions (capital, subordinated loans) and guarantees.
SRIW is a public limited company subject to company law and governed by the Law of 2 April 1962 on Federal Investment Companies and Regional Investment Companies.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment
euInitiatives: SRIW is not yet involved (directly or indirectly) in initiatives, policies or legal issues covered by the European Commission. In the frame of the so-called NEXT Programme created by Wallonia (Belgium), we finance  Circular Economy industrial projects (loans and capital).  Therefore, SRIW applied (and was selected) to the European Commission call "Circular Economy Financing Expert Group".
